> [{quoted}](name=moschinomomo,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=72ejXOMM,comment-id=000000000003,timestamp=2018-05-03T17:52:52.143+0000)
>
> you literally listed even more reasons to rework him.

Not saying it's a bad idea.  Still, what can riot do?  Trynd revolves around being an unkillable douche that deals more damage the closer he is to death.  They can't make him practical for anything or even less clunky lest they overtune him and make him overbearing.  Likewise, he's so lousy that nerfing him is pointless.  It feels like Trynd is just a plain lost cause.

Funny enough being an unkillable douche that deals more damage the closer he is to death is pretty much the same fantasy as Olaf. Just that Olaf does it in a way that gives him actual counterplay other than the generic "kite him". And the fact that he's actually killable and not a complete douche because of that.

Just that Olaf does it in a way that gives him actual counterplay other than the generic "kite him". And the fact that he's actually killable and not a complete douche because of that.

And Olaf can be played in either jungle and top and has better variety in his item and rune builds compared to Trynd.
